name: Steel Rats™ Stylish Mayhem - Skins DLC
detailed_description: Wreck and ride through the streets of Coastal City with style! With Stylish Mayhem DLC you can get a special set of 4 unique skins (for each character and for his/her chromed roaring stallion).
about_the_game: Wreck and ride through the streets of Coastal City with style! With Stylish Mayhem DLC you can get a special set of 4 unique skins (for each character and for his/her chromed roaring stallion).
short_description: Steel Rats™ Stylish Mayhem - Skins DLC
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Portuguese, Russian
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS Mojave
  • Processor: i5 2.9 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Iris 550, compatible with Metal

Recommended:

linux_requirements.minimum:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64 bit Ubuntu 18.04 LTS
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 630, compatible with Vulkan
